Where are you!?\""},{"lineNumber":143166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんとかしてあっちに近づくぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll somehow get over there!\""},{"lineNumber":143167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おらおら！　邪魔だ邪魔だー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey hey! Move aside, move aside!\""},{"lineNumber":143168,"originalJapaneseLine":"「舞い踊れ！　式神・鳥！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dance and fly! Shikigami Bird!\""},{"lineNumber":143169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃあっ！？　なんだ、これ！　魔法！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaa!? What is this!? Magic!?\""},{"lineNumber":143170,"originalJapaneseLine":"虎子の陰陽師の力により召喚した式神の鳥が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Shikigami bird summoned by Torako's onmyouji powers,"},{"lineNumber":143171,"originalJapaneseLine":"空中を飛びまわり、刃の翼で敵を切り刻む。","translatedEnglishLine":"flew around in the air, slicing enemies with its blade-like wings."},{"lineNumber":143172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふーん！　どんなもんよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe! How do you like that!\""},{"lineNumber":143173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、調子に乗るなぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, don't get cocky!\""},{"lineNumber":143174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひえっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":143175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあああっ！　全力！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaah! Full power!\""},{"lineNumber":143176,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝子の横合いからの刀の突撃、","translatedEnglishLine":"Katsuko's sword charge from the side,"},{"lineNumber":143177,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵は為す術なく体に大穴を開けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"pierced a large hole through the monster soldier's body with no way to resist."},{"lineNumber":143178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「油断するんじゃないの！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't let your guard down!\""},{"lineNumber":143179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、言われなくても分かってるわよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I know that without being told!\""},{"lineNumber":143180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次！　右の三体！　援護！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Next! The three on the right! Cover me!\""},{"lineNumber":143181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「這い回れ！　式神・蛇！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Crawl around! Shikigami Snake!\""},{"lineNumber":143182,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あっちの二人は大丈夫そうね……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Those two over there seem okay...)"},{"lineNumber":143183,"originalJapaneseLine":"（一体一体は向こうの方が強くても","translatedEnglishLine":"(Even if individually the enemies over there are stronger,"},{"lineNumber":143184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物は連携をしないから、今はまだ押せてる……）","translatedEnglishLine":"monsters do not cooperate, so for now we're holding our ground...)"},{"lineNumber":143185,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ただ、やはり数が違いすぎる……","translatedEnglishLine":"(But still, the numbers are too different..."},{"lineNumber":143186,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このままじゃ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"at this rate...)"},{"lineNumber":143187,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛は周りにいる魔物兵を睨んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai glared at the monster soldiers surrounding her."},{"lineNumber":143188,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場は上杉軍と魔軍が入り混じる","translatedEnglishLine":"The battlefield was a chaotic mix of Uesugi forces and demon army,"},{"lineNumber":143189,"originalJapaneseLine":"混戦の様相を呈しており、愛は内心で舌を打った。","translatedEnglishLine":"presenting a brutal melee, and Ai clicked her tongue inwardly."},{"lineNumber":143190,"originalJapaneseLine":"（なにより乱戦が過ぎる……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Above all, the battle is too chaotic..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋭く重い剣撃に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a sharp and heavy sword strike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防御に使った武器ごと魔物兵の体が砕かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the body of the monster soldier, along with the weapon used for defense, was shattered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はああああああっ！」
閃光のように日本刀が閃き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Japanese sword flashed like a burst of light,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は軍神を前に次々と地に伏していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the monster soldiers fell one after another before the war god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謙信様すごい……
ここに来てまだあんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even now here, still like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うん、絶好調って感じ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yeah, it feels like he's in top form..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人とも！　自分の戦いに集中なさい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Both of you! Focus on your own battles!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！」
（絶好調？　馬鹿言わないで……）
「謙信様！
敵の数が予想より多いです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are more enemies than expected!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは部隊総崩れの可能性も！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, the entire unit might collapse!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一度退却を！」
「この部隊の指揮官は、
今ここで倒す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be defeated here and now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうしなければ、またこのような悲劇が起こる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we don't, such tragedy will occur again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はああああああ！」
「あ、ちょっと――！」
「……ちっ、謙信の奴め」
乱戦の中、ランスから遠くに見える謙信の姿は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amidst the fierce battle, the figure of Kenshin seen from afar by Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確実に動きが鈍くなっていた。
「あ、ランス様！　どこに！？」
「なんとかしてあっちに近づくぞ！」
「おらおら！　邪魔だ邪魔だー！」
「舞い踊れ！　式神・鳥！」
「ぎゃあっ！？　なんだ、これ！　魔法！？」
虎子の陰陽師の力により召喚した式神の鳥が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Shikigami bird summoned by Torako's onmyouji powers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空中を飛びまわり、刃の翼で敵を切り刻む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: flew around in the air, slicing enemies with its blade-like wings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふーん！　どんなもんよ！」
「ちょ、調子に乗るなぁ！」
「ひえっ！？」
「はあああっ！　全力！」
勝子の横合いからの刀の突撃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katsuko's sword charge from the side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は為す術なく体に大穴を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pierced a large hole through the monster soldier's body with no way to resist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「油断するんじゃないの！」
「い、言われなくても分かってるわよ！」
「次！　右の三体！　援護！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Next! The three on the right! Cover me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「這い回れ！　式神・蛇！」
（あっちの二人は大丈夫そうね……）
（一体一体は向こうの方が強くても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Even if individually the enemies over there are stronger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物は連携をしないから、今はまだ押せてる……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: monsters do not cooperate, so for now we're holding our ground...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ただ、やはり数が違いすぎる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But still, the numbers are too different...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままじゃ……）
愛は周りにいる魔物兵を睨んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai glared at the monster soldiers surrounding her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場は上杉軍と魔軍が入り混じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battlefield was a chaotic mix of Uesugi forces and demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混戦の様相を呈しており、愛は内心で舌を打った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: presenting a brutal melee, and Ai clicked her tongue inwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なにより乱戦が過ぎる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Above all, the battle is too chaotic...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

敵の数が予想より多いです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are more enemies than expected!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは部隊総崩れの可能性も！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, the entire unit might collapse!

今ここで倒す」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確実に動きが鈍くなっていた。
「あ、ランス様！　どこに！？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Shikigami bird summoned by Torako's onmyouji powers,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: flew around in the air, slicing enemies with its blade-like wings.

勝子の横合いからの刀の突撃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katsuko's sword charge from the side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「油断するんじゃないの！」
「い、言われなくても分かってるわよ！」
「次！　右の三体！　援護！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Next! The three on the right! Cover me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「這い回れ！　式神・蛇！」
（あっちの二人は大丈夫そうね……）
（一体一体は向こうの方が強くても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Even if individually the enemies over there are stronger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物は連携をしないから、今はまだ押せてる……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: monsters do not cooperate, so for now we're holding our ground...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ただ、やはり数が違いすぎる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But still, the numbers are too different...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままじゃ……）
愛は周りにいる魔物兵を睨んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai glared at the monster soldiers surrounding her.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battlefield was a chaotic mix of Uesugi forces and demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混戦の様相を呈しており、愛は内心で舌を打った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: presenting a brutal melee, and Ai clicked her tongue inwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なにより乱戦が過ぎる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Above all, the battle is too chaotic...
